name: Hypnofriend
description:
18+

A short hypno-romance story with your highschool friend, Alex.

This story contains mind-control, conditioning, non-consent, and mild sexual themes. If any of those make you uncomfortable, this may not be for you.

If you notice any errors or typos, please tell me in the comments. I want to improve this story with you guys, and maybe make more in the future.
